name: Tresemme Keratin Shampoo + Serum + Mask Combo(3 pcs)
description: Tresemme Keratin Shampoo + Serum + Mask Combo Contains: Explore the entire range of  Hair Combos available on Nykaa. Shop more  Tresemme products here.You can browse through the complete world of   Tresemme Hair Combos .Tresemme Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Hair Serum With Argan Oil: (MRP: 495.00/-) | Quantity: 1 | Expiry Date: 15 August 2024Keep frizz at bay and get salon smooth hair! Get professional-quality smoothness with Tresemme Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Hair Serum. Infused with argan oil, this formula instantly controls frizz and gives your hair vibrancy and shine. Based on lab tests, you'll have 2x smoother hair and longer-lasting frizz control for up to 48 hours, even in 80% humidity. This serum makes hair more manageable through frizz control, smoothing, and styling. It is infused with the goodness of oil and moisturizing actives that style and protect hair. It is a versatile product that acts as a primer by coating the hair surface before styling, so your hair is protected from any heat damage. It contains light oil, which makes your hair shine. Distilled pine oil is known to enhance natural smoothness and shine. Infused with argan oil, known to be rich in antioxidants, it gives hair vibrancy and shine, while castor oil is known to leave hair smooth and silky. Keratin Smooth Hair Serum is easy to apply and helps style hair better-twisting and turning into any style becomes easy. Pick the right amount of serum for the right hair type. This serum is ideal for medium-thick or curly hair.Features: Smoothing hair serum that conditions hair and helps control frizz  Enriched with the goodness of argan oil and castor oil Gives you up to 2x smoother hair Helps to control your frizz for up to 48 hours Makes hair smoother, shinier, and more manageable Ideal for medium-thick, curly hair  Suitable for all hair types About the Brand: From its origin in salons, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look and feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salon. These anti-hair fall products are infused with fiber, moisture, and nutrients so that your hair feels rehydrated, soft, and shiny again. The salon performance formula helps in reducing hair fall while deeply nourishing hair scalp and follicles for revitalized tresses. It is formulated with argan oil that moisturizes your hair and scalp and protects your hair from everyday damage.
